title: Is living in Dubai more expensive than Doha? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on where you work and how you live. For Example, If your work provides your accommodation, you will save 2–2500 for single room and 4–8000 QR for a family place. For transportation, it also depends on your life style. You need at least 1000 QR for your own car ( 500 for Gas & 3–500 for periodic maintenance depending on what car you drive and how you drive it and the frequency of driving). As for the food, there’s a huge variance. If you are eating fast or from restaurants, You can have a daily three meals from 30-150 or more. A huge difference between an ordinary cafeteria to a branded restaurant and a high cost dining one. Entertainment is quit expensive in Qatar. From Movie tickets that costs around 40 to 55 and nightlife if you wanna have a drink that will costs a round 25–70 at a night club if the place doesn’t have an entrance fee which is 100 at least. But Still, in the end it depends on your life style. You can survive on 3k’s if you are really controlling your budget
